Asia stocks inch higher as China rebounds, dollar firmAsian shares edged up on Tuesday thanks to a bounce in battered Chinese markets, although investors were cautious after a slide on Wall Street amid diminishing expectations of a near-term Federal Reserve rate cut, which in turn underpinned the dollar. Exclusive: Taiwan ally Guatemala mulls commercial ties with China, foreign minister saysGuatemala is considering reaching out to develop formal trade ties with China, the Central American country's foreign minister told Reuters on Monday, although it plans to maintain its existing relations with Taiwan.
